name: com.unity.2d.animation
description: 2D Animation provides all the necessary tooling and runtime components for skeletal animation using Sprites.

samples.description: Various 2D Animation sample scenes to show different usage of the 2D Animation tooling for various outcomes.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
- Fix Sprite Library Asset multi-editing in the Inspector window. (case 1417747)

### Changed
- Updated Visibility Tab documentation page.
- Removed the 'Open' button from Sprite Library Asset and Sprite Library Source Asset inspectors.
